name: centipede_damascus
text: How does he do that?

name: jamers
text: He actually manages to look into his own body in a fit of despair.

name: spinynorman
text:
The Roast Beef School of Ocular Shenanigans

They are my favorite type of shenanigans, the ocular kind

name: lexsenthur
text: The ultimate act of introspection.

name: jhunter
text:
man what if you did that and you saw a brain tumour from within
you would be all kinds of messed up by that

name: tom-ba
text: But you would really save by skipping the MRI.

name: gtpbearsuit
text:
Can't you...

SEE?

name: darthemed
text: I like the possibility that Roast Beef has other eyes he can make small.

name: tombsgrave
text: Tiny... tiny... eyes.

name: deancain29
text: The no-eyed Beef

name: tinhand
text: I did not even remember this strip

name: songbirdspectre
text: A comment left by songbirdspectre was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by solobuttons, sumisueme, STUART)

name: jonmw
text: Also like a Nedroid comic about Reginald making his head bigger

name: gumfish
text: Chubby for reading Nedroid, even if it took me 11 months to notice.

text: Ray really tries to get Philippe excited about this.

name: poostick
text: oh you mean these eyes

name: peterjoel
text: THESE EYES!

name: aelindil
text: Oooh, these eyes!

name: pberard
text: My heart's explodin'! THESE EYES!

name: farqussus
text: It was a good idea. If they weren't all three months part, it could've caught on.

name: tekende
text: That sort of makes it funnier at this point.

name: woodenteeth
text:
Your basal nervous system has some control over...

THESE EYES!

name: lazarusloafer
text:
Cry every night
for you

name: gouldgonewild
text: Revolver doing Guess Who. I like it.

name: random_shorts
text: These eyes can do anything! Just ask...Baby Jesus!

name: goosey
text: They are his Face Eyes.

name: overmedicated
text: Shame he's not sat in his Body Chair.

name: cousinted
text: A sneak preview of the enemies from Silent Hill 5

name: donnatron
text: What could be more frightening than a bunch of eyeless Beefs? All blind and in despair...

name: paperboy_2000
text: In panel 7, if you look real hard, you can see a green flash just as Beef's eyes disappear.

name: yingkaixing
text: This is my first time using bbcode. Here's hoping.

name: yingkaixing
text: Damnit!

name: cailetshadow
text: This is the opposite of Ray's trick. They should take this act public.

name: crawfomp
text: My god, you're right!  Cat with big eyes, cat with small eyes, $2.

name: overmedicated
text: A comment left by overmedicated was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by trialandterror, Bophur, rowboat, hawaiian_robot)

text: do you SEE

name: hypoluxa
text: Love how Beef leans in closer to Phillipe.

name: rowboat
text: Yes, Beef. Those eyes.

name: erinye
text: Ray's amazed and a bit jealous, as he no longer has any eyes to pull this with.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: Good call. I had forgotten he sold his eyes.

name: jonnay
text: Man, that's some real Cartilage Head shit.

name: crumpetsandtea
text: i remember, my granpa showed me this trick

name: meddle
text: how has no one brought up the alt text on this?  is so good.  is so funny.

name: stuart
text: I thought I did, but I was confusing it with the time I added it to the ohnorobot transcription and put "i love this alt text" in the comment box.

name: andyboy
text: I get the feeling doing this always cheers RB up.

name: changuitotuerto
text: This is still one of my favorite strips. Every so often I go to the search bar and type in "eyes" when I want to feel good.

name: wallabeechamp
text: What is with these cats and the weird eye tricks?

name: sje46
text: I find this comment lame.

text: I find this comment redundant.

text: There is a reason why I posted that.  A very satisfactory reason.
